sense.gloss: to break down, to break to pieces, to crush
to be able to use, to be good at, to have a good command of
to finish, to complete, to manage, to perform
to do ... well, to do ... completely

sdata.j: サルは２、３↑歳↑↓さい↓で↑成|熟↑↓せいじゅく↓す|る。
sdata.e: A monkey is mature at a few years old.

sdata.j: さくらんぼは↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓か↑七月↑↓しちがつ↓に|↑熟↑↓じゅく↓す|。
sdata.e: Cherries are ripe in June or July.

sdata.j: これらのりんごはもうすぐ|↑熟↑↓じゅく↓す|だろう。
sdata.e: The apples will be ripe soon.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑体↑↓からだ↓は↑三↑↓さん↓↑十↑↓じゅう↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑成|熟↑↓せいじゅく↓す|る。
sdata.e: Men get their growth before they are thirty.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑畑↑↓はたけ↓の↑作物↑↓さくもつ↓が↑育↑↓そだ↓ち、りんごの↑実↑↓み↓が↑赤↑↓あか↓く|↑熟↑↓じゅく↓す|のをみました。
sdata.e: She watched the gardens grow, and she watched the apples turn red and ripen.
